alert.note: Alert for Crisp; Dooly; Sumter (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 12 at 12:20PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Dooly, southeastern Sumter and northern Crisp Counties through 1245 PM EDT... At 1220 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Cobb, or 12 miles west of Cordele, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Cordele, Vienna, Leslie, De Soto, Desoto, Cobb, Lamar, East Crisp, Georgia Veterans Memorial St Pk, Richwood, Drayton, Tippettville, Tremont, Wenona and Hatley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
